title: Whenever, Wherever
author: Shakira
lyrics:
[00:16.21] Lucky you were born that far away so
[00:18.77] We could both make fun of distance
[00:20.79] Lucky that I love a foreign land for
[00:23.19] The lucky fact of your existence
[00:25.29] Baby, I would climb the Andes solely
[00:27.62] To count the freckles on your body
[00:29.73] Never could imagine there were only
[00:32.28] Ten million ways to love somebody
[00:34.25] Le-do-lo-le-lo-le, le-do-lo-le-lo-le
[00:38.64] Can't you see? I'm at your feet
[00:43.30] Whenever, wherever
[00:45.59] We're meant to be together
[00:47.42] I'll be there, and you'll be near
[00:49.98] And that's the deal, my dear
[00:52.35] There over, hereunder
[00:54.52] You'll never have to wonder
[00:56.41] We can always play by ear
[00:58.82] But that's the deal, my dear
[01:02.16] 
[01:12.09] Lucky that my lips not only mumble
[01:14.47] They spill kisses like a fountain
[01:16.55] Lucky that my breasts are small and humble
[01:18.84] So you don't confuse 'em with mountains
[01:21.01] Lucky I have strong legs like my mother
[01:23.35] To run for cover when I need it
[01:25.60] And these two eyes that for no other
[01:27.88] The day you leave, will cry a river
[01:29.86] Le-do-lo-le-lo-le, le-do-lo-le-lo-le
[01:34.38] At your feet, I'm at your feet
[01:39.14] Whenever, wherever
[01:41.18] We're meant to be together
[01:43.22] I'll be there, and you'll be near
[01:45.75] And that's the deal, my dear
[01:48.06] There over, hereunder
[01:50.31] Or up above, don't wonder
[01:52.25] We can always play by ear
[01:54.75] But that's the deal, my dear
[01:58.22] 
[02:05.43] Le-do-lo-le-lo-le, le-do-lo-le-lo-le
[02:10.08] Think out loud, say it again
[02:14.54] Le-do-lo-le-lo-le-lo-le
[02:16.79] Tell me one more time
[02:19.02] That you'll live lost in my eyes
[02:23.23] 
[02:26.04] Whenever, wherever
[02:28.28] We're meant to be together
[02:30.05] I'll be there, and you'll be near
[02:32.53] And that's the deal, my dear
[02:34.83] There over, hereunder
[02:36.98] You got me head over heels
[02:39.25] There's nothing left to fear
[02:41.55] If you really feel the way I feel
[02:43.77] Whenever, wherever
[02:45.82] We're meant to be together
[02:48.01] I'll be there, and you'll be near
[02:50.41] And that's the deal, my dear
[02:52.64] There over, hereunder
[02:54.86] You got me head over heels
[02:57.02] There's nothing left to fear
[02:59.42] If you really feel the way I feel
[03:01.37]
